display_long_description:
#                                                                                                                                                                                                      
[media]
# **Fight the Undead**
Undead Quest is a VR rogue-lite wave shooter. Hit, dodge, and slash your way through thousands of fun-filled undead foes.

[media]
# **Hit, Dodge, Slash, Repeat**
Your primary weapons are a bat and a magic ball. Master your skills and kill the undead from a distance or use the environment to make a combo kill.

[media]
# **Upgrade and Build Ultimate Skillset** 
Collect the points and choose from dozens of available upgrades - augment your ball with devastating powers.

[media]
# **One More Run**
Uncover the mystery of the undead by completing the story mode or see how long you can survive in survival mode. The game sessions are roguelite-inspired, so each playthrough and skill set you create will be unique.

# **Fight the Undead**
Undead Quest is a VR rogue-lite wave shooter. Hit, dodge, and slash your way through thousands of fun-filled undead foes.

![{"height":400,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/507828918_751061897295113_399559700241501768_n.mp4?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=qjpLbPnn-fsQ7kNvwFgEQxt&_nc_oc=AdlyjSy3-aEKzFze9RX3Bx99iXeEicYfuVxiNNqT5PBxoxCNZI4fpzS-hisgOWsk7P0&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=2ysCHkifjox8vmukHx0BgA&oh=00_Afrj9ZtJqL0jmTSgLcQ6SY83RhTbMUEUplsB6NdwmRjIbw&oe=6962FE59)
# **Hit, Dodge, Slash, Repeat**
Your primary weapons are a bat and a magic ball. Master your skills and kill the undead from a distance or use the environment to make a combo kill.

![{"height":400,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/491823763_4154099168195233_6412607577589191733_n.mp4?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=kM-I8g3ixMoQ7kNvwGY7LHW&_nc_oc=AdmDlMy-0qeCnBzKKfmO0ukSHs-J9L27N1FUkxCZlU2jzwL0FhMgkZvskL9NrTm728w&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=2ysCHkifjox8vmukHx0BgA&oh=00_AfqwXKBiDcnqvRwMAsx9dkfmSRskbD5F49KE50-KZGmmrA&oe=6962DEDE)
# **Upgrade and Build Ultimate Skillset** 
Collect the points and choose from dozens of available upgrades - augment your ball with devastating powers.

![{"height":400,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/491820987_1099167878797501_6609429194438124224_n.mp4?_nc_cat=108&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=5dAELmcvdVEQ7kNvwE-Ydg0&_nc_oc=AdnEMZKVqegZAvUnblvn4sHK84vmWFL1u3UywELeraJ7jmRdxluLT2v1TqC3IgbWLAI&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=2ysCHkifjox8vmukHx0BgA&oh=00_AfrVt7QHkuDMfNOVU79RHONdGiH9tefU6OoGmq9jPIZtLA&oe=6962F78A)
# **One More Run**
Uncover the mystery of the undead by completing the story mode or see how long you can survive in survival mode. The game sessions are roguelite-inspired, so each playthrough and skill set you create will be unique.
